|------------|-------------|------------------|----------------------------------------|-----------------------------|-----------------|--------------------------------|
| 2025-08-16 | [Name]      | 20               | 5 (3 spoilers, 2 abuse)                | Moved 3 spoilers; removed 2 | 2h              | Reminder sent to flagged users |
| 2025-08-17 | [Name]      | 15               | 4 (4 off-topic)                        | Rejected 4                  | 1.5h            | Redirected users to guidelines |
